text:
I just spent some time trying to install Tomcat 5.0.12 and 5.0.14 on a Windows 
2003 Server. With the above mentioned JDK v.1.4.2_02 it didn't work at all 
whereas 1.4.2_01 did work perfectly well.
creator: Olivier.Fehr@ofehr.com

text:
Then use the old release ;-)
Sorry, but this looks like a JDK issue, or a setup problem on your part.
creator: remm@apache.org

text:
It is highly likely that there _is_ a problem with tomcat 5 and the latest JDK 
from SUN.
Now the challenge is to find out why tomcat doesn't want to start (can you 
reproduce this, do others have the same problem, etc).
And I am using the old one for now.
creator: Olivier.Fehr@ofehr.com
